item.title: PlayStation Stars to close as Sony Interactive Entertainment evaluates future loyalty program efforts
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/playstation-stars-to-close-as-sony-interactive-entertainment-evaluates-future-loyalty-program-efforts

  • PS4
  • PS5

Points redeemable until November 2026.

Sony Interactive Entertainment will end the PlayStation Stars loyalty program fully on November 2, 2026, the company announced. The program will no longer accept new members starting today, and there will be no new campaigns from July 23.

“Since launching the program [in 2022], we’ve learned a lot from evaluating the types of activities our players respond best to, and as a company, we are always evolving with player and industry trends,” said Sony Interactive Entertainment vice president of Network Advertising, Loyalty, and Licensed Merchandise Grace Chen. “Through this evaluation, we have decided to refocus our efforts and will be winding down the current version of PlayStation Stars. We will continue to evaluate our key findings from this program, and are looking into ways to build upon these learnings.”

Here are some key happenings as these changes take effect:

  • Starting today, PlayStation Stars will no longer accept new members for this version of the program.
  • If members choose to cancel their PlayStation Stars membership starting today, it will not be possible to rejoin this version of the program, and members will lose all earned Points.
  • Current PlayStation Stars members can still earn Digital Collectibles and Points, and level up their status until July 23, 2025 at 7:59 a.m. PT / 3:59 p.m. BT / 11:59 p.m. JST. After this date, there will be no new PlayStation Stars Campaigns available, or any additional rewards or status benefits to earn.
  • This version of the PlayStation Stars program will fully end on November 2, 2026 and current PlayStation Stars members can continue to redeem Points as long as their Points don’t expire before then.

It should be noted that PlayStation Stars members will still be able to access their Digital Collectibles even after these changes take effect.

“We want to thank all of our players for supporting PlayStation Stars since the launch in 2022,” Chen added. “As we explore new ways to evolve our loyalty program efforts for the future, we’ll continue to celebrate all of our players through the various community activities we have planned.”

item.title: Fruitbus launches June 19 for PS5, later in 2025 for Xbox Series and Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/fruitbus-launches-june-19-for-ps5-later-in-2025-for-xbox-series-and-switch

  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Available both physically and digitally for PlayStation 5 and Switch.

Publisher Silver Lining Studio and developer Krillbite Studio will release Fruitbus for PlayStation 5 on June 19, the companies announced. A physical edition will follow shortly after.

Both Xbox Series and Switch versions will follow later in 2025. The Switch version will also be available physically. While the Switch version was previously announced, the Xbox Series version is newly announced.

Fruitbus first launched for PC via Steam on October 28, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Silver Lining Interactive:

Cook, Connect, and Explore in Fruitbus

Fruitbus is a cozy open-world adventure where food is the key to friendship. Step into your grandma’s beloved food truck and set off across the vibrant Gustum Archipelagos, foraging for ingredients, meeting quirky locals, and serving up custom dishes made with love. As you expand your menu, you’ll build bonds, uncover secrets, and make every stop a new chance to bring people together through the power of food.

Digital or Boxed: Serve It Your Way

Whether you’re downloading your copy or collecting the beautifully packaged physical edition, Fruitbus on PlayStation 5 delivers a heartwarming, flavor-packed journey that’s perfect for fans of cozy games and meaningful adventures. Pre-orders for the physical edition are now open at the Silver Lining Interactive Store.

item.title: Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam coming west this summer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/trouble-witches-final-episode-01-daughters-of-amalgam-coming-west-this-summer

  • PS4
  • Switch

Side-scrolling shoot 'em up first launched in 2023.

ININ Games will release Studio Siesta-developed side-scrolling shoot ’em up Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam for PlayStation 4 and Switch in the west this summer, the company announced.

Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam first launched for PlayStation 4 and Switch on July 6, 2023 in Japan. A PlayStation 5 version was planned for release in March 2025, but has seemingly been delayed.

ININ Games will also release a physical Special Edition featuring a special box, art book, and the original soundtrack CD.

Here is an overview of the game, via ININ Games:

About

From the developer who knows how to create a shooter that looks good and plays like a dream!

Originally released in 2007 by the developer of Cotton Reboot!, Trouble Witches has evolved into the ultimate cute ’em up experience after over a decade of development and updates. Now, in Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam, this manic shooter returns with a visual overhaul, new game modes, and its most complete version ever.

Whether you’re a fan of fast-paced bullet hell shoot ’em up or charming Japanese anime-inspired art styles, Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam delivers the ultimate cute ’em up experience.

Key Features

  • Adorable Witches – Play as 12 unique characters with distinctive abilities, attack styles, and magical familiars for endless strategic depth.
  • Bullet-Hell Gameplay – Experience exhilarating shoot ’em up action with extreme danmaku mechanics that will put your reflexes to the test.
  • Unique Combat System – Summon the Magic Circle to slow down enemy fire and convert bullets into gold coins. Spend your earnings at the Pumpkin Shop on Magic Cards that grant powerful abilities, clear bullets, and protect your witch from harm.
  • Vibrant Visuals – Stunning hand-drawn 2D character designs combined with beautifully reimagined 3D stage backgrounds for a fresh, eye-catching experience.
  • Complete Downloadable Content Pack – Includes all previously released downloadable content (Cotton available separately).
  • Endless Replayability – Infinite fun for both casual and hardcore players, thanks to 8 different game modes.
